short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tracks browsing activity, monitoring tabs and URLs, and securely sends data to a local server for analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension captures the URL of the active webpage and securely sends it to a trusted REST API. The API then performs a trace route operation via Dublin trace route and returns the data to the extension. Upon receipt, the trace route information is displayed securely within the extensionâ€™s user interface for your convenience.
